video.title: The Bible
video.synopsis: Re-creating the Bible's vision of human and divine history for modern audiences, this sweeping miniseries integrates key biblical tales and parables.

episodes.synopsis: Noah endures God's wrath, and Abraham reaches the promised land but still must prove his faith in God.
episodes.title: In the Beginning

episodes.synopsis: Moses leads the Israelites out of Egypt, and his faith in God is rewarded when the Red Sea parts to let the Israelites escape the pharaoh's chariots.
episodes.title: Exodus

episodes.synopsis: Joshua conquers Jericho, and Delilah betrays Samson as the Israelites battle the Philistines.
episodes.title: Homeland

episodes.synopsis: Saul is consumed with jealousy after David defeats Goliath. Later, King David ushers in a golden age for Israel but is soon seduced by power and lust.
episodes.title: Kingdom

episodes.synopsis: The Jews are enslaved in Babylon, where their faith is put to the test. Decades later, they're allowed to return to Jerusalem.
episodes.title: Survival

episodes.synopsis: When the angel Gabriel tells Mary she will bear a child, Joseph takes her to Bethlehem, where Jesus is born. Later, Judea comes under Pilate's rule.
episodes.title: Hope

episodes.synopsis: Jesus feeds the enormous crowds in Galilee and brings a dead man, Lazarus, back to life.
episodes.title: Mission

episodes.synopsis: Caiaphas meets with Judas about betraying Jesus, who is later arrested and condemned to death.
episodes.title: Betrayal

episodes.synopsis: Judas hangs himself, and Peter denies Jesus -- who's forced to drag his cross to Golgotha to be crucified.
episodes.title: Passion

episodes.synopsis: Mary Magdalene believes she's gone mad when she finds Jesus' tomb empty, and Paul experiences a miraculous change of faith on a journey to Damascus.
episodes.title: Courage
